name: Alienated 2
summary: Alienated 2 is a unique survival top-down shooter with RPG elements. Battle countless waves of infected and complete multiple diverse mission objectives. Hunt elite monsters for rare guns and loot. Face monstrous zombie bosses and receive epic and unique loot drops. Complete item sets, upgrade equipment and distribute stats to create countless builds. In this top down shooter, you will face never-ending hordes of walking dead and the only option for survival is to kill them all.
